name: Quality Outcomes in a Culture of Value-Based Nursing Care - D026
description: This knowledge base consists of the course materials for 'Quality Outcomes in a Culture of Value-Based Nursing Care'. This course intends to help the student develop the following competencies: 1.)Analyze Culture of Improvement -The learner analyzes the culture of continuous quality improvement and the provision of value-based care to optimize patient outcomes using a systems-thinking analytic approach. 2.) Develop Organizational Quality Assessment - The learner develops a systematic process that incorporates quality measures and benchmarks to assess organizational strengths and vulnerabilities. 3.) Integrate Performance and Process Improvements - The learner integrates performance and process improvement methodologies to develop solutions for identified quality and safety gaps in the practice setting. 4.) Establish Metrics on Value-Based Care - The learner establishes measurable metrics and processes to evaluate the effectiveness of value-based care strategies and initiatives.

name: Test Data
description: This knowledge base is for testing purposes only. It contains dummy data that can be used for testing and development purposes. This knowledge base is not intended for production use.

name: FAQ Resources
description: This knowledge base is for help in using the Hnry application. It contains frequently asked questions and answers, as well as guides and tutorials on how to use the various features of the application. If you have any issues or questions while using the Hnry application, this knowledge base is a great resource.

name: Freelancer Resources
description: This knowledge base is for freelancer-related help. It contains articles, guides, and resources on how to be a successful freelancer, including tips on finding clients, managing finances, and growing your business. If you're a freelancer looking for advice and resources, this knowledge base is a great place to start.

name: Tax Resources
description: This knowledge base is tax-related help (like GST, ACC, or other New Zealand related tax). It contains articles, guides, and resources on how to manage your taxes as a freelancer, including information on deductions, filing requirements, and deadlines. If you're a freelancer looking for tax advice and resources, this knowledge base is a great place to start.

name: The Leap Resources
description: This knowledge base outlines other freelancer's & entrepreneur's nexperiences transitioning from a full time career. It contains articles, guides, and resources on how to make the leap to freelancing/entrepreneurship, including tips on finding clients, managing finances, and growing your business. If you're considering making the leap to freelancing, this knowledge base is a great resource.
